name: Office Wars
description:
In the near future mega corporations run the world. Employes are treated like tools and discarded as such. Fight to the death for the job securing titel of "Employee of the Month" or get incinerated on your way out of the office. Dont let your coworkers beat you to it !

Controlls :

- Walk from tile to tile with WASD or the Arrowkeys

- Press C to capture Rooms

- Press F to interact with rooms

- Press leftShift to end your turn when your AP at the top of the screen are spend
